info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 6:11PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Rabun, southeastern Macon, Transylvania, northwestern Henderson, southeastern Jackson, southeastern Haywood, southwestern Buncombe, northwestern Pickens and northeastern Oconee Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 610 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles southeast of Waynesville to 15 miles southeast of Sylva to 12 miles southeast of Franklin. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Brevard, Waynesville, Lake Junaluska, Highlands, Rosman, Cashiers, Lake Toxaway, Graveyard Fields, B.R. Parkway-Mount Pisgah To The Nc Arboretum and Looking Glass. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for northeastern Georgia...western North Carolina...and Upstate South Carolina.
